Reviews.Content: don't stay in the Hepingli I had a terrible experience with this hotel.The service was bad, the carpet is disgusting, the furniture is old and dilapidated. Prostitutes called on the hotel phone all hours of the night. The refrigerator and safe in the room didn't work. The front desk refused to take valuables for safe keeping when I went out during the day. Don't stay in this hotel.
Reviews.Author: Thermon
